+"""Stress tests related to node initialization (init.cpp)."""
+import time
+import random
+import glob
+from pathlib import Path
+
+from test_framework.test_framework import BitcoinTestFramework
+from test_framework.test_node import ErrorMatch
+
+
+class InitStressTest(BitcoinTestFramework):
+    """
+    Ensure that initialization can be interrupted at a number of points and not impair
+    subsequent starts.
+    """
+
+    def set_test_params(self):
+        self.setup_clean_chain = False
+        self.num_nodes = 1
+
+    def run_test(self):
+        """
+        - test bailing initialization after seeing a certain log line.
+        - test bailing init after seeing a random number of log lines.
+        - test removing certain essential files to test startup error paths.
+        """
+
+        self.stop_node(0)
+        node = self.nodes[0]
+
+        def sigterm_node():
+            node.process.terminate()
+            node.process.wait()
+            log_path = Path(node.debug_log_path)
+            log_path.unlink()
+            log_path.touch()
+
+        def check_clean_start():
+            """Ensure that node restarts successfully after various interrupts."""
+            node.start(extra_args=['-txindex=1'])
+            node.wait_for_rpc_connection()
+            node.waitforblockheight(200)
+
+        lines_to_bail_after = [
+            'scheduler thread start',
+            'Verifying wallet',
+            'Loading P2P addresses',
+            'Loading banlist',
+            'Loading block index',
+            'Switching active chainstate',
+            'Loaded best chain:',
+            'init message: Verifying blocks',
+            'loadblk thread start',
+            'txindex thread start',
+            'net thread start',
+            'addcon thread start',
+            'msghand thread start',
+        ]
+        for bail_line in lines_to_bail_after:
+            self.log.info(f"Starting node and will exit after line '{bail_line}'")
+            node.start(extra_args=['-txindex=1'])
+            logfile = open(node.debug_log_path, 'r', encoding='utf8')
+
+            MAX_SECS_TO_WAIT = 30
+            start = time.time()
+            num_lines = 0
+
+            while True:
+                line = logfile.readline()
+                if line:
+                    num_lines += 1
+
+                if line and bail_line.lower() in line.lower():
+                    self.log.info(f"terminating node after {num_lines} log lines seen")
+                    sigterm_node()
+                    break
+
+                if (time.time() - start) > MAX_SECS_TO_WAIT:
+                    self.log.warning(f"missed line {bail_line}; bailing now after {num_lines} lines")
+                    sigterm_node()
